_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Pavlov VR
author: iamkubi@gmail.com
description: Pavlov is a multiplayer shooter in VR

installation.script:
apt update
apt install -y gdb curl lib32gcc1 libc++-dev unzip
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${APP_ID} ${BETA_VERSION} +quit
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +app_update 1007 +quit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp /mnt/server/steam/steamapps/common/Steamworks\ SDK\ Redist/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so
cp /mnt/server/steam/steamapps/common/Steamworks\ SDK\ Redist/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/Pavlov/Binaries/Linux/steamclient.so
chmod +x /mnt/server/PavlovServer.sh
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Logs
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/maps
touch /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/mods.txt
touch /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/blacklist.txt
touch /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/whitelist.txt
echo "[/Script/Pavlov.DedicatedServer]" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "bEnabled=true" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "ServerName=\"${SERVER_NAME}\"" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "MaxPlayers=10     #Set this to 10 for Shack. 24 is the reasonable maximum for PC, anything higher almost always results in lag. " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "ApiKey=\"${API_KEY}\"" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "bSecured=true" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "bCustomServer=true " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "bVerboseLogging=false " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "bCompetitive=false #This only works for SND" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "bWhitelist=false " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "RefreshListTime=120 " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "LimitedAmmoType=0 " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "TickRate=90" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "TimeLimit=60" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "#Password=0000 " >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "BalanceTableURL=\"vankruptgames/BalancingTable/main\"" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "MapRotation=(MapId=\"${FIRST_ROTATION_MAP}\", GameMode=\"${FIRST_ROTATION_GAMEMODE}\")" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini
echo "Password=${RCON_PASSWORD}" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/RconSettings.txt
echo "Port=${RCON_PORT}" >> /mnt/server/Pavlov/Saved/Config/RconSettings.txt

variables.name: Beta Version
variables.description: If you wish to install a beta version such as Shack, Shack RC, or Beta.

variables.name: API Key
variables.description: You will need a API key if you are hosting more than two servers on one IP. https://pavlov-ms.vankrupt.com/servers/v1/key

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: This will be the password for RCON.

variables.name: First Map Rotation Name
variables.description: This will be the first map in the rotation.

variables.name: First Map Rotation Gamemode
variables.description: This will be the gamemode for the first map rotation.

variables.name: RCON Port
variables.description: The port you will use for RCON.
